name: Pokemon Onyx
description:
Pokemon Onyx is a collaboration between Emmanuelle Henao (101237746) and Woonhak Kong (101300258) made for Game Engines III at George Brown College. Pokemon Onyx is a pokemon clone where you enter unsafe areas and fight monsters with your own skills and abilities.

CONTROLS:

WASD for movement

Left Shift for sprint

Mouse left click to select skills/UI options

E -- enemy hp down to 5

P -- player hp down to 5

Escape -- exit battle scene instantly

Github Link: https://github.com/DVHenao/PokemonUnity
